name: Levant Capital Limited
overview: Levant Capital is a management-owned investment firm established in 2006 and focused primarily on private equity investments in the Middle-East, Turkey, and North Africa. The firm is based in Dubai and manages $200 million, most of which has been invested through and alongside the MENA Transformation Fund | LP, a fully invested regional private equity fund that counts international institutional investors and leading GCC family offices as investors.

funding_round.source_description: APR Energy Receives Strategic Investment of $30 million from Levant Capital
